name: Potato game. Trilogy DEMO
description:
Coming soon...

In the meantime, you can download the demo version!

This demo allows you to play the first 2 levels; Grassland and The King's Castle.

On the fittingly-named Potato Island, unusual things happen every day. Today is no exception. A mysterious portal opened up on the island, summoning all sorts of people and things to wreck havoc on the island, and possibly the rest of the world, too! And worst of all, there's nobody on the island that can stop this madness! Well... almost nobody...

- Play through the original three Potato games—all remade in a [mostly] new engine! - Scream your way through all 11 potating levels, including Grassland, The King's Castle, Oven Street and Nostalgia Zone! - Remastered graphics and sounds, along with a slew of new music tracks, make this the best looking—and best sounding—Potato game. yet! - Tons of other new features, including save slots, achievements, and much more!

Can the Screaming Potato Head stop all these threats and save the world?!
